venue.address_2: cross street Center between Chapel and Crown
venue.name: Bentara

item.description:
Come join NHC member Kevin at a "Sneak Peak" of this years International Festival of Arts and Ideas!

Festival Executive Director Mary Lou Aleskie will discuss creative collaborations and highlights of this years 15th annual Festival to be held later this summer. There will be Free Appetizers served and Drink Specials available:

Thursday May 6, 2010
6 pm -8 pm
Bentara Restaurant

For those of you not familiar: Every year the City of New Haven hosts the "International Festival of Arts and Ideas" during the summer. Many of the events are right out on the Green, including free concerts! For more information about the festival and all it has to offer, you may want to check out it's website here: International Festival of Arts & Ideas

I'm sure many of us will be interested in going to the events of the festival later this summer, so why not drop by and join Kevin in finding out more of what's in store.

Thanks to Kevin for letting us know about this Meetup. He'll serve as your Host for the evening and hopes to see some of you there!
item.name: Arts and Ideas Preview Happy Hour!
